Name: Mastiha Mojito
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. CHURN (stir) with bar spoon. Fill glass with more crushed ice and CHURN some more. Keep adding ice and churning until drink fills glass. Serve with straws.
Review: Mastiha adds a distinctively Greek fresh flavour to this otherwise fairly classic mojito.
History: For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
